CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, page 9 reads: "Homemakers See latest in Foods, Appliances...5. The debonair Morgan & Kaufman men's fine clothing booth had the male all agog with their display of summer, sport and evening wear. Representatives are Carl Kaufman, Joe Saul and Joe Zappala...Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Two men, possibly including Carl Kaufman, Joe Saul, or Joe Zappala, standing in Morgan & Kaufman men's clothing booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Clothing trade--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
